remarks.format: ## Remarks `ListViewArray`类提供等效提供 Visual Basic 6.0 运行时功能`ListView`数组。The `ListViewArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ListView` array. 它不提供 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当用户编辑项的标签时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AfterLabelEdit`事件发生在用户完成修改项的文本。The `AfterLabelEdit` event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item. 在用户键入项的新字符串传递给事件，并且事件处理程序可以拒绝更改。The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change. 如果事件处理程序会拒绝更改，如前的用户开始编辑项文本将恢复为文本。If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item. 为了使`AfterLabelEdit`事件被引发的属性控件必须设置为`true`。In order for the `AfterLabelEdit` event to be raised, the property of the control must be set to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当用户开始编辑项的标签时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `BeforeLabelEdit`事件发生时在用户开始修改项的文本。The `BeforeLabelEdit` event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item. 如果事件处理程序取消此事件，则用户不能更改文本。If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot change the text. 可以使用此事件来防止用户编辑中的特定项控件。You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the control. 如果的属性控件设置为`false`，则`BeforeLabelEdit`不会引发事件; 若要更改的项目标签的所有用户尝试将自动被都拒绝。If the property of the control is set to `false`, the `BeforeLabelEdit` event is not raised; all user attempts to change item labels are automatically rejected. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件使更新项信息保存在缓存中，以便能轻松获得。Handling this event enables the to update the item information held in cache so that it is readily available. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 在单击 中的 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a in a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Click`事件将传递到其事件处理程序。The `Click` event passes a to its event handler. 因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击次数、 鼠标轮旋转或位置），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 但是，如果导致单击的操作不是鼠标，例如，按下 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置应被认为是双击而不是两次单击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks. `Click`双击控件每次都会引发事件。The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果有事件处理程序`Click`并的事件[控件](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)，则`Click`和双击控件，并且这两种方法调用时将引发事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果双击控件时，控件不支持事件，`Click`事件可能会引发两次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the `Click` event might be raised two times. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当用户单击 控件内的列标题时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ColumnClick`当用户单击列标题中的项的详细信息视图中的其中一个事件时发生控件 (当属性设置为)。The `ColumnClick` event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a control (when the property is set to ). `ColumnClick`通常处理事件中的项进行排序，使用所单击的列与列要作为排序依据。The `ColumnClick` event is typically handled to sort the items in the , using the clicked column as the column to sort by. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Occurs when the column header order is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ColumnReordered`事件可取消事件，可以通过处理事件并设置取消[System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.Cancel](xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel)属性设置为`true`。The `ColumnReordered` event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the [System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.Cancel](xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel) property to `true`. 但是，如果取消了该事件，则的不会更改为值。However, if the event is canceled, the of the will not change to the value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DragEnter`用户拖放操作过程中首次将鼠标光标拖到控件上方时将引发事件。The `DragEnter` event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件，可以自定义的外观使用所有者描述的控件。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 将引发此事件时，才属性设置为`true`并属性设置为`View.Details`。It is raised only when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to `View.Details`. 在控件中每个列标题，会发生此事件。This event can occur for each column header in the control. 所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅属性参考主题。For more information on owner drawing, see the property reference topic. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GiveFeedback`启动拖放操作时引发事件。The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 通过使用`GiveFeedback`事件，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供用户可视反馈。By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ItemActivate`当用户激活中的一个或多个项事件时发生控件。The `ItemActivate` event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the control. 用户可以通过激活某项单击或双击，具体取决于值属性，或使用键盘。The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the property, or with the keyboard. 从事件处理程序中`ItemActivate`事件，可以引用或属性，以访问该集合中选择的项的来确定哪些项被激活。From within the event handler for the `ItemActivate` event, you can reference the or properties to access the collection of items selected in the to determine which items are being activated. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ItemDrag`用户开始拖动项时发生事件。The `ItemDrag` event occurs when the user begins dragging an item. 通常的事件处理程序`ItemDrag`事件执行的任务通过调用拖动的方法。Typically the event handler for the `ItemDrag` event performs the task of dragging by calling the method. 可以使用此事件来执行的任务将项拖入和移出应用程序所需控件。You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按以下顺序发生键事件：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许控件接收键盘事件，将设置在窗体的属性事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当焦点在控件上按下键时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按以下顺序发生键事件：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyPress` `KeyPress`非字符键不会引发事件; 但是，不要引发非字符键和事件。The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用属性设置为示例的键击在运行时和使用或修改常见击键的子集。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许控件接收键盘事件，将设置在窗体的属性事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 当焦点在控件上释放键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is released and the control has focus.

summary.span: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Layout`事件发生时添加或删除，在指定边界内的控件更改和其他更改发生时可能会影响控件的布局时子控件。The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 布局事件可通过使用抑制和方法。The layout event can be suppressed by using the and methods. 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局的每个更改。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果您重设大小，并将一个控件移动，每个操作都会引发`Layout`事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 用鼠标单击控件时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针位于形状通常单击鼠标按钮会导致以下一系列控件中的事件：Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseClick` 关闭发生两次单击足够时间，具体由鼠标设置的用户的操作系统，将生成事件而不是第二个`MouseClick`事件。Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an event instead of the second `MouseClick` event. > [!NOTE] > 事件是逻辑上控件的事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们通常会引发其他操作，例如，在控件有焦点时按 ENTER 键。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个典型用途`MouseHover`是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域内的控件上时显示工具提示。A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle"). 若要引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位的属性。The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the property. `MouseHover`定义和与检测到事件和属性。The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the and properties. 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: `MouseHover` / 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发此事件属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Occurs when the control is finished validating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将焦点更改通过使用键盘 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等），通过调用或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 当更改焦点，使用鼠标或通过调用方法时，按以下顺序执行的焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 如果属性设置为`false`，则和`Validated`所抑制的事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and `Validated` events are suppressed. 如果的属性设置为`true`中事件委托，通常会发生后的所有事件所抑制的事件。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
